# Task T1357: Refactor PaymentService to accept dependencies via construct

**Priority**: P1

## Description
Refactor PaymentService to accept dependencies via constructor injection (StripeProcessor trait, config)

## Reason for Delegation
Task involves 8+ files, 400+ LOC across backend/src/payment module, requiring dependency injection, factory pattern, and test isolation with mocks. This exceeds complexity threshold.
